Package view

package view
  • Class
    Description
    ArtSection
    ArtSection class extends SectionBase This frame shows all the books from the Art section, with JLabels to show their tittles, authors, prices and buttos to add to the basket.
    Basket
    Basket class extends BigFrames.
    BigFrames
    BigFrames class extends JFrame This class sets the aset for anther frames, it sets the size, icon and a font.
    Button
    Button class extends JButton.
    Colour
    Colour class contains the colors used in the project
    EditBalance
    EditBalance class extends BigFrames This frame shows the user balance and allows to edit it
    Exclusive
    Exclusive class extends BigFrames This frame shows all the exclusive books from the library, with JLabels to show their tittles, authors, prices and buttons to add to the basket.
    Facade
    Facade class extends BigFrames This class sets the aset for anther frames, it sets the size, icon and a font.
    FantasySection
    FantasySection class extends SectionBase This frame shows all the books from the Fantasy section, with JLabels to show their tittles, authors, prices and buttos to add to the basket.
    HorrorSection
    HorrorSection class extends SectionBase This frame shows all the books from the Horror section, with JLabels to show their tittles, authors, prices and buttos to add to the basket.
    InfoFrame
    InfoFrame class extends JFrame This frame sets the aset for anther frames, it sets the size, icon and a font.
    Inside
    Inside class extends BigFrames This frame shows teh inside of the library shown the sections in the library.
    IView
    This IVew interface contains the methods that must be implemented by the view
    LogInFrame
    LogInFrame class extends InfoFrame This frame is used for the user login.
    PasswordField
    PasswordField class extends JPasswordField This class sets the asset for PasswordField used in the project
    RomanceSection
    RomanceSection class extends SectionBase This frame shows all the books from the Romance section, with JLabels to show their tittles, authors, prices and buttos to add to the basket.
    SearchSection
    SearchSection class extends BigFrames This frame is for looking up for a book by the author or their tittle putting that information in a textField and showing the result in a table.
    SectionBase
    SectionBase class extends BigFrames This class sets the aset for section frames, it sets the size, icon and a font.
    SingInFrame
    SingInFrame class extends InfoFrame This frame is used for the user sing up.
    TextField
    TextField class extends JTextField This class sets the asset for TextField used in the project
    TextPrompt
    The TextPrompt class will display a prompt over top of a text component when the Document of the text field is empty.
    TextPrompt.Show
     
    View
    This class is the view for the library.
